Module no.ntnu.idatt1002
Package no.ntnu.idatt1002.dao

Interface ExpenseDAO

All Superinterfaces:
DAO<Expense,Long>
All Known Implementing Classes:
SqlExpenseDAO
public interface ExpenseDAO extends DAO<Expense,Long>
This interface defines methods to interact with expenses and expense related tasks.

  • Method Details

    • create

      Expense create(long userId, ExpenseType type, String name, BigDecimal amount, Date date, int shares)
      Creates an expense.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user adding the expense
      type - the expense type
      name - the name
      amount - the amount
      date - the date
      shares - the amount of people this expense is shared between
      Returns:
      a new expense

    • delete

      Deletes an expense.
